column22: Would you be willing to share your contact information with local authorities?
column27: Select one or more NoVA FSS Charters to subscribe to communications:
column28: Do you want to use the same contact information as above?
column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: Hawk crossing signal was red. Mother and daughter entered crosswalk. We were stopped in left lane heading northbound on Potomac, but the SUV behind us illegally pulled around us into the right lane and ran the red.  There was another SUV behind him in the right lane and they went through the signal as well. The mother and child had not reached the northbound lanes yet, otherwise it would have been a disaster.
column21: The SUV also violated the law by passing a car (me) stopped at a crosswalk. The HAWK signal was a solid ""multiple"" red.  I didn't have time to get the license numbers as I was quite surprised and concerned and they were going over 30mph.
